mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Witch Doctor", "Dixie Plucker", and "Hurricane". ROUND DANCES "Tammy", and "Ducky". SPECIAL FEATURES "Flash! From the Brussels World's Fair", "Seventh National Convention", and "What It Takes to be a Successful Caller's Wife". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "On the Record", "As I See It", "Style Series: Forward Six Variations", "Square of the Month: Jack Logan", "Dr. Lloyd Shaw", "Round the Outside Ring", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "From the Floor", "Paging the Roundancers: Jerry and Charlie Tuffield", and "Square Dance Date Book".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
